questions.text: Which of the following is a common machine learning technique used for predictive maintenance?
What is the main challenge of dealing with data from IIoT sensors?
options: The data is always perfect and clean
The volume, velocity, and variety of the data
The data is always in a single, simple format
questions.correctAnswer: The volume, velocity, and variety of the data

questions.text: What is the role of a data historian in an industrial setting?
options: To tell stories about the factory's past
A system designed to collect and store large amounts of time-series data from industrial processes
A person who manually records sensor readings
A type of data visualization software
questions.correctAnswer: A system designed to collect and store large amounts of time-series data from industrial processes

questions.text: Anomaly detection in IIoT is the process of:
options: Identifying data points or events that deviate from the normal behavior
Deleting any data that looks unusual
Only collecting data that follows a strict pattern
questions.correctAnswer: Identifying data points or events that deviate from the normal behavior

questions.text: Prescriptive analytics goes beyond predicting future outcomes by:
options: Only describing what happened in the past
Suggesting actions to take to affect desired outcomes
Providing a detailed diagnosis of a problem
questions.correctAnswer: Suggesting actions to take to affect desired outcomes

questions.text: What does the term 'Data Preprocessing' refer to in the context of IIoT analytics?
options: The final step of data analysis
Cleaning, transforming, and preparing raw data for analysis
questions.correctAnswer: Cleaning, transforming, and preparing raw data for analysis

questions.text: Which technology is fundamental for handling the large-scale data processing required in IIoT analytics?
options: Cloud computing and big data platforms
questions.correctAnswer: Cloud computing and big data platforms
